page.title: 12LLANSAMLET SCHOOL (cont)
page.content:
The school roll at present is 540 pupils with a number of preferred placements from outside the catchment area.The curriculum covers English, Mathematics and Computer Studies, Science,Geography,History,Religious Education,French,Welsh,Art,Craft(Cooke ry,Textiles,Woodwork and Metalwork) and physical education.Many clubs are taken out of the classroom time by our teachers and our school has a successful record in many sports.Since 1972 a new 11-16 comprehensive school has been planned for Birchgrove to replace Llansamlet's very old and unsuitable buildings.However at the time of writing the opening date has been put back yet again-this time to September 1990!
Gareth Griffiths
